<L>6629<pc>450-2<k1>मधुसूदन<k2>मधुसूदन
{@Madhusūdana@}¦ (“the destroyer of Madhu”) = Kṛṣṇa
(Viṣṇu): I, 7364, 7887, 8064, 8197, 8323; II, 45, 889,
953, 1354, 1355, 1366, 1578, 1580; III, 473, 482, 494, 496,
511, 520, 524, 537, 539, 576, 581, 585, 593, 892, 1900,
1982, 1985, 4076 ({%surāṇāṃ sarveṣām ādiḥ%}), 8349 (in
Dvāravatī), 8353 ({%Hariḥ%}, do.), 8755 (i.e. Viṣṇu (Nārāyaṇa)),
8761 (do.), 13497 (do.), 13569 (do.), 13579 (do.), 13580
(do., slew Madhu and Kaiṭabha); V, 139, 141, 2144, 2261,
2541 ({%triyugaṃ%}), 2542 (do.), 2563, 2573, 2594, 2620, 2646,
2657, 2717, 2726, 2727, 2780, 2814, 2874, 2882, 2908, 2944,
2967, 2982, 2984, 2995, 3015, 3022, 3026, 3056, 3125, 3143,
3151, 3159, 3165, 3217, 3231, 3242, 3256, 3257, 3272, 3273,
3276, 3286, 3290, 4235, 4239, 4240, 4246, 4438, 4441, 4726,
4730, 4759, 4773, 4774, 4776, 4790, 4807, 4833, 4838, 4841,
4847, 4859, 4860, 5342, 5343, 5349; VI, 865, 878, 882,
1097, 1143, 2171, 3027 (origin of the name), 3045, 4326,
4330, 4333, 4907, 4932, 5547; VII, 1197, 1229 (only B.),
2680, 2684, 2947, 2954, 2957, 3050, 3693, 3857, 6421, 6458,
7804, 7808, 8183, 8187, 8941; VIII, 3608, 3768, 3783,
3784, 3789, 4117, 4364, 4487, †4656, †4678; IX, 1905,
1973, 1980, 1983, 2848 ({%K°%}), 3405; XI, 343, 452, 455,
480, 548, 557, 618, 668, 705, 711, 726, 731, 746, 749;
XII, 16 ({%Hariṃ%}), 1583, 1601, 1867, 1872, 1896, 1937, 7533
({%Puruṣottamaḥ%}, i.e. Viṣṇu, origin of the name), 7546
(= do.), 13129, 13188, 13522 (i.e. Viṣṇu, slew Madhu and
Kaiṭabha), 13620, 13672 (i.e. Viṣṇu); XIII, 622, 689, 722,
2138, 2140, 3469, 4657, 4658, 5377, 6315, 6333, 6359, 6879,
6894, 6957 (= Viṣṇu, 1000 names), 7401, 7404, 7443,
7458; XIV, 424, 569, 1484, 1486, 1488, 1521, 1544, 1557,
1961, 1992 ({%purāṇarṣiḥ%}), 2004, 2559; XV, 259; XVI, 23,
79, 100, 160; XVIII, 128.
<LEND>
